con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/" name="shipmentWs" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/" schemaLocation="shipmentWs.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <!--SOAP methods and responses--> <!--3.4.5 validateShipment--> <message name="ValidateShipmentRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:ValidateShipmentRequest"/> </message> <message name="ValidateShipmentResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:ValidateShipmentResponse"/> </message> <!--3.4.7 createShipment--> <message name="CreateShipmentRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateShipmentRequest"/> </message> <message name="CreateShipmentResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:CreateShipmentResponse"/> </message> <!--3.4.9 cancelShipment--> <message name="CancelShipmentRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:CancelShipmentRequest"/> </message> <message name="CancelShipmentResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:CancelShipmentResponse"/> </message> <!--3.4.11 updateShipment--> <message name="UpdateShipmentRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:UpdateShipmentRequest"/> </message> <message name="UpdateShipmentResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:UpdateShipmentResponse"/> </message> <!--3.4.13 getDocuments--> <message name="GetDocumentsRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:GetDocumentsRequest"/> </message> <message name="GetDocumentsResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:GetDocumentsResponse"/> </message> <!--3.4.15 doManifest--> <message name="DoManifestRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:DoManifestRequest"/> </message> <message name="DoManifestResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:DoManifestResponse"/> </message> <!--3.4.17 getManifest--> <message name="GetManifestRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:GetManifestRequest"/> </message> <message name="GetManifestResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:GetManifestResponse"/> </message> <!--EO SOAP methods and responses--> <!--Operation mapping--> <portType name="VlsShipmentWebService"> <!--3.4.5 validateShipment--> <operation name="ValidateShipmentOperation"> <input message="tns:ValidateShipmentRequest"/> <output message="tns:ValidateShipmentResponse"/> </operation> <!--3.4.7 createShipment--> <operation name="CreateShipmentOperation"> <input message="tns:CreateShipmentRequest"/> <output message="tns:CreateShipmentResponse"/> </operation> <!--3.4.9 cancelShipment--> <operation name="CancelShipmentOperation"> <input message="tns:CancelShipmentRequest"/> <output message="tns:CancelShipmentResponse"/> </operation> <!--3.4.11 updateShipment--> <operation name="UpdateShipmentOperation"> <input message="tns:UpdateShipmentRequest"/> <output message="tns:UpdateShipmentResponse"/> </operation> <!--3.4.13 getDocuments--> <operation name="GetDocumentsOperation"> <input message="tns:GetDocumentsRequest"/> <output message="tns:GetDocumentsResponse"/> </operation> <!--3.4.15 doManifest--> <operation name="DoManifestOperation"> <input message="tns:DoManifestRequest"/> <output message="tns:DoManifestResponse"/> </operation> <!--3.4.17 getManifest--> <operation name="GetManifestOperation"> <input message="tns:GetManifestRequest"/> <output message="tns:GetManifestResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="VlsShipmentWebServicePortBinding" type="tns:VlsShipmentWebService"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <!--3.4.5 validateShipment--> <operation name="ValidateShipmentOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <!--3.4.7 createShipment--> <operation name="CreateShipmentOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <!--3.4.9 cancelShipment--> <operation name="CancelShipmentOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <!--3.4.11 updateShipment--> <operation name="UpdateShipmentOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <!--3.4.13 getDocuments--> <operation name="GetDocumentsOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <!--3.4.15 doManifest--> <operation name="DoManifestOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> <!--3.4.17 getManifest--> <operation name="GetManifestOperation"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="VlsService"> <port name="VlsWebServicePort" binding="tns:VlsShipmentWebServicePortBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/vls/gw/shpmntws"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xs:schema version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/" xmlns:tns="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <!--3.4.5 validateShipment--> <xs:element name="ValidateShipmentRequest" type="tns:ValidateShipmentRequestType"/> <xs:complexType name="ValidateShipmentRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:CreateOrValidateShipmentRequestType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ValidateShipmentResponse" type="tns:ValidateShipmentResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="ValidateShipmentResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ShipmentResponseType"/> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.5 validateShipment--> <!--3.4.7 createShipment--> <xs:element name="CreateShipmentRequest" type="tns:CreateShipmentRequestType"/> <xs:element name="CreateShipmentResponse" type="tns:CreateShipmentResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="CreateShipmentRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:CreateOrValidateShipmentRequestType"></xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreateOrValidateShipmentRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Shipment" type="tns:ShipmentRequestType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="50"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreateShipmentResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ShipmentResponseType"></xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.7 createShipment--> <!--3.4.9 cancelShipment--> <xs:element name="CancelShipmentRequest" type="tns:CancelShipmentRequestType"/> <xs:element name="CancelShipmentResponse" type="tns:CancelShipmentResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="CancelShipmentRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:ShipmentNumber" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="50"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CancelShipmentStatusType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ResponseStatusType"> <xs:attribute name="shipmentNumber" type="tns:ShipmentNumberType" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CancelShipmentResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ResponseWithStatusCodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ShipmentStatus" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="50" type="tns:CancelShipmentStatusType"></xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.9 cancelShipment--> <!--3.4.11 updateShipment--> <xs:element name="UpdateShipmentRequest" type="tns:UpdateShipmentRequestType"/> <xs:element name="UpdateShipmentResponse" type="tns:UpdateShipmentResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="UpdateShipmentRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="NewShipment" type="tns:ShipmentRequestType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="shipmentNumber" type="tns:ShipmentNumberType" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="UpdateShipmentResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ResponseWithStatusCodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Shipment" type="tns:ShipmentType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.11 updateShipment--> <!--3.4.13 getDocuments--> <xs:element name="GetDocumentsRequest" type="tns:GetDocumentsRequestType"/> <xs:element name="GetDocumentsResponse" type="tns:GetDocumentsResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="GetDocumentsRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:ShipmentNumber" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="50"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="GetDocumentsResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ShipmentResponseType"></xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.13 getDocuments--> <!--3.4.15 doManifest--> <xs:element name="DoManifestRequest" type="tns:DoManifestRequestType"/> <xs:element name="DoManifestResponse" type="tns:DoManifestResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="DoManifestRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:ShipmentNumber" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="50"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="DoManifestResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ResponseWithStatusCodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:ShipmentNumber" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="50"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.15 doManifest--> <!--3.4.17 getManifest--> <xs:element name="GetManifestRequest" type="tns:GetManifestRequestType"/> <xs:element name="GetManifestResponse" type="tns:GetManifestResponseType"/> <xs:complexType name="GetManifestRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:attribute name="shipmentNumber" type="tns:ShipmentNumberType" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="manifestDate" type="xs:date" use="required"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="GetManifestResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ResponseWithStatusCodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ManifestPdf" type="xs:base64Binary" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--EO 3.4.17 getManifest--> <!--request--> <xs:complexType name="RequestWithGroupProfileType"> <xs:attribute name="groupProfileName" use="optional" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <!--response--> <xs:complexType name="ResponseWithStatusCodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Status" type="tns:ResponseStatusType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--response for validate and create shipment--> <xs:complexType name="ShipmentResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ResponseWithStatusCodeType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Shipment" type="tns:ResponseShipmentType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="50"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--billingNumber--> <xs:attribute name="billingNumber" type="xs:string"/> <!--shipmentNumber--> <xs:element name="ShipmentNumber" type="tns:ShipmentNumberType"/> <xs:simpleType name="ShipmentNumberType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:minLength value="10"/> <xs:maxLength value="50"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <!--response shipping--> <xs:complexType name="ResponseShipmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ShipmentStatus" type="tns:ResponseStatusType" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="Shipment" type="tns:ShipmentType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--shipment for creation--> <xs:complexType name="ShipmentRequestType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:ShipmentType"> <xs:attribute name="printOnlyIfCodable" type="xs:boolean" use="optional" default="false"/> <xs:attribute name="billingNumber" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:length value="14"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <!--shipment--> <xs:complexType name="ShipmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="UsmProp" type="tns:UsmPropType" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--USM Property--> <xs:complexType name="UsmPropType"> <xs:attribute name="key" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="value" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <!--Status of a soap response--> <xs:complexType name="ResponseStatusType"> <xs:attribute name="statusCode" type="xs:int" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="statusText" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="statusMessage" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="ResponseStatus" type="tns:ResponseStatusType"/> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ship="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ship:CreateShipmentRequest groupProfileName="?" ship:billingNumber="?"> <!--1 to 50 repetitions:--> <Shipment printOnlyIfCodable="?"> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <UsmProp key="?" value="?"/> </Shipment> </ship:CreateShipmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ship="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ship:UpdateShipmentRequest groupProfileName="?" shipmentNumber="?"> <NewShipment groupProfileName="?" ship:billingNumber="?"> <!--1 to 50 repetitions:--> <Shipment printOnlyIfCodable="?"> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <UsmProp key="?" value="?"/> </Shipment> </NewShipment> </ship:UpdateShipmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ship="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ship:ValidateShipmentRequest groupProfileName="?" ship:billingNumber="?"> <!--1 to 50 repetitions:--> <Shipment printOnlyIfCodable="?"> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <UsmProp key="?" value="?"/> </Shipment> </ship:ValidateShipmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: createShipment
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ship="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken> <wsse:Username>USER1</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">4711</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ship:CreateShipmentRequest > <Shipment printOnlyIfCodable="true" billingNumber="IT_000001A0101">
<UsmProp key="address.sender.name1" value="Micromata GmbH"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.street" value="Marie-Calm-Str."/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.streetNumber" value="1-5"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.plz" value="34121"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="address.receiver.name1" value="Seppel"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.street" value="Goethestr."/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.streetNumber" value="74"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.plz" value="34119"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="dimension.weight" value="10000"/>
<UsmProp key="product.id" value="V01PAK"/> </Shipment> </ship:CreateShipmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: createShipment
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ship="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken> <wsse:Username>USER1</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">4711</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ship:CreateShipmentRequest> <Shipment printOnlyIfCodable="true" billingNumber="IT_000001A0101">
<UsmProp key="address.sender.name1" value="Micromata GmbH"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.street" value="Marie-Calm-Str."/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.streetNumber" value="1-5"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.plz" value="34121"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="address.receiver.name1" value="Seppel"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.street" value="Goethestr."/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.streetNumber" value="74"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.plz" value="34119"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="dimension.weight" value="10000"/>
<UsmProp key="product.id" value="V01PAK"/> </Shipment> </ship:CreateShipmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: updateShipment
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ship="http://shipment.webservice.vls.dhl.de/"> <soapenv:Header> <wsse:Security soapenv:mustUnderstand="1" xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <wsse:UsernameToken> <wsse:Username>USER1</wsse:Username> <wsse:Password Type="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText">4711</wsse:Password> </wsse:UsernameToken> </wsse:Security> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ship:UpdateShipmentRequest shipmentNumber="99990000000000000047"> <NewShipment billingNumber="IT_000001A0101"> <UsmProp key="address.sender.name1" value="Micromata GmbH"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.street" value="Marie-Calm-Str."/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.streetNumber" value="3"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.plz" value="34121"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.sender.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="address.receiver.name1" value="Roger"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.street" value="Goethestr."/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.streetNumber" value="74"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.plz" value="34119"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="dimension.weight" value="10000"/>
<UsmProp key="product.id" value="V01PAK"/> </NewShipment> </ship:UpdateShipmentRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<UsmProp key="address.receiver.name1" value="Roger"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.street" value="Goethestr."/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.streetNumber" value="74"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.plz" value="34119"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.city" value="Kassel"/> <UsmProp key="address.receiver.country" value="DEU"/>
<UsmProp key="dimension.weight" value="10000"/>
